name: My Old Reader
description:
This style makes The Old Reader more to my liking.

Roboto font required, unless you have Helvetica Neue installed. http://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/roboto
additional_info:
It would be best to just look at the screenshot, but the main features include:
- Helvetica Neue or Roboto fonts
- Removed some social features (sidebar links to 'Liked', 'Starred', etc.)
- Ditched dark green colors and backgrounds for dark gray
- Cleaner, flatter, less round look
- Right-aligned unread post counts
- Read posts have no background at all
- Sidebar items no longer all-caps
